meanings.sent2: The aroma of saffron filled the kitchen as she cooked.

meanings.definition: A plant of the crocus family with showy purple or yellow flowers
meanings.sent1: The saffron in her garden bloomed beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: He admired the delicate saffron flowers swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid his acorns under the saffron plant.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheerful as a field of saffron in full bloom.
